2025-12-09T08:51:31.8310281Z [36;1m[0m

2025-12-09T08:51:31.8310752Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8310955Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8311155Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8311335Z [36;1m# Copia o App Next.js[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8311576Z [36;1mcp -R .next/standalone/. deploy/[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8311811Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8312083Z [36;1m# Copia estáticos (mas vamos limpar os pesados depois)[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8312467Z [36;1mif [ -d public ]; then cp -R public deploy/public; fi[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8312788Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8313099Z [36;1mcp -R .next/static/. deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8313368Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8313637Z [36;1mcp staticwebapp.config.json deploy/staticwebapp.config.json[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8313968Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8314220Z [36;1mecho "--- 3. DEPENDÊNCIAS DE PRODUÇÃO NO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8314683Z [36;1m# O bundle standalone já traz apenas as dependências necessárias para execução.[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8315163Z [36;1m# Executar "npm ci" aqui reinstala TODAS as dependências do projeto[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8315607Z [36;1m# (incluindo as de desenvolvimento) dentro do artefato, inflando o pacote[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8316038Z [36;1m# para ~1GB e fazendo o deploy do Azure Functions falhar.[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8316479Z [36;1m# Apenas garantimos que não há dependências extras sem recriar node_modules.[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8317217Z [36;1mnpm prune --omit=dev --prefix deploy[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8317558Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8317830Z [36;1mecho "--- 4. OTIMIZAÇÃO DO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8318280Z [36;1m# Mantemos os binários Debian do Prisma (compatíveis com o runner do SWA)[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8318716Z [36;1m# e removemos apenas arquivos grandes ou não usados.[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8319076Z [36;1mbash scripts/prune-deploy-artifact.sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8319350Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8319572Z [36;1m# AÇÃO EXTRA: Esvaziar pasta Public da FUNCTION[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8319987Z [36;1m# (Os arquivos estáticos já foram subidos para o CDN na etapa de build padrão)[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8320468Z [36;1m# A Function não precisa dos vídeos MP4/MOV, apenas o navegador precisa.[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8320853Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mp4" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8321154Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mov" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8321464Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.jpg" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8321762Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.png" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8322013Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8322394Z [36;1m# Limpeza Geral[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8322608Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/docs[0m
2025-12-09T08:51:31.8322825Z [36;1mrm -rf deploy/logs[0m
